549640.name: Izanami's Dream Battle Original Soundtrack
549640.description:
The original soundtrack for Izanami's Dream Battle.

Tracklist:

  • 1 - To the Moon!
    The opening story theme of the game.
  • 2 - Izanami's Dream Battle ~Opening Version~
    The titlescreen and main theme of Izanami's Dream Battle.
  • 3 - The Calm
    Nieve's Stage Theme.
  • 4 - The Storm
    Nieve's Battle Theme.
  • 5 - Fires Can't Start in Vacuums
    Fuego's Stage Theme.
  • 6 - But Explosions Can!
    Fuego's Battle Theme.
  • 7 - Moon Hoppin'
    Conejita's Stage Theme.
  • 8 - Does the Moon Have Red Eyes Too?
    Conejita's Battle Theme.
  • 9 - Building Upon A Dream
    Luna's Stage Theme.
  • 10 - I Dream About the Moon
    Luna's Battle Theme.
  • 11 - Izanami's Dream Battle ~Stage Theme~
    Izanami's Stage Theme.
  • 12 - The Nightmare
    Izanami's Battle Theme.
  • 13 - Izanami's Dream Battle Ending Theme ~JAW version~ featuring Ruko Yokune (UTAU)
    The ending theme of the game.
  • 14 - Punkin' Eater
    Punkin's Stage Theme.
  • 15 - Izanami's Halloween Dream
    Punkin's Battle Theme.
  • 16 - Building a Better Dream
    Level Editor BGM.
